title: 2.007 Robot
short_description: Final project for 2.007 (Design and Manufacturing I)
long_description:
Final project for 2.007 (Design and Manufacturing I). This class is what high school robotics competitions are based off of, except instead of a team of 20 high schoolers for half a year you're a solo college student for 4 months.

The robot is tasked with scoring as many points as possible on the game board. The year that I took the class, the game board was based off the Wakanda Forever movie that was partly filmed at MIT. The task my robot completed was to "assemble the DNA" by placing red balls onto a rotating elevated plate. See the video demo below--actually placing the balls is very difficult with the rotating helix, but the robot is at least able to reliably lift the balls up to the plate.
